extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Mejora tu experiencia de navegación en Safari bloqueando anuncios, rastreadores y otros contenidos no deseados.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

status_enabled.description: Shown in the popup when the extension is active.

status_inactive.description: Shown in the popup when the extension appears to be inactive.

status_blocking_active.description: Shown when blocking is active and account is valid.

status_access_expired.message: Acceso expirado – abre la app para más detalles
status_access_expired.description: Shown when the account has expired.

status_expiring_soon.message: La cuenta expira pronto – revisa la app
status_expiring_soon.description: Shown when the account is expiring within 7 days.

status_trial_active.description: Shown when freemium trial is active with days remaining.

status_trial_expired.description: Shown when freemium trial has expired.

open_app.description: Text on the button that opens the main app.
